FxStudio was a proprietary curve editor and runtime that
was used by Demiurge Studios for VFX (particles), camera shake,
and several miscellaneous systems in Seoul Engine.

As of 2022, FxStudio is no longer available for licensing.

As such, all functionality dependent on FxStudio is no longer
available in Seoul Engine. Associated code and data (mostly wrapped
by SEOUL_WITH_FX_STUDIO) remains for reference and to facilitate
implementation of a replacement dependency and systems.

Search for SEOUL_WITH_FX_STUDIO in all files of the Seoul Engine
repository to find most functionality dependent on FxStudio.
